Question
========

Of 7 subjects, before and after a given effort of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 7 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 34 and the standard deviation is 32. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 2.44
* 2.81
* 2.85
* 8.46

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2.44: Incorrect
* 2.81: Correct
* 2.85: Incorrect
* 8.46: Incorrect
